name: Raiders of Cael Grand
description:
In a world where we barely care about what some heroes did ages ago...

Just an opening scene for a JRPG that does not exist. Submission for the GB Studio Jam (Skittle Special #2).
Press the A button to advance text (Z on the keyboard). Press start or enter to "start".

(Made using Chris Maltby's GB Studio 2.0)
